Related repos

  • Plays, encodes, and streams media
  • automates video library transcoding and management across multiple devices
  • Streams movies and shows to iOS and tvOS devices
  • Transcribes YouTube videos and files locally via Whisper
  • Node.js tool for transcoding video, audio, and images using FFmpeg
  • Converts video formats in batches on macOS
  • AI tool for transcribing and summarizing videos from YouTube, TikTok, Bilibili, and more
  • Next.js SaaS platform for AI video generation
